    	# Testing	   comments.  # 
   "#"   	= {"#" =[
 3e3  ,	#
 ]}["##"."."]  # what?

 ["##"] 
#
	3e3 = 2015-12-31T03:21:43#
-----------------------------%
'#':
  '#': [ 3000 ]
'##':
  '.': {}
  '3e3': 2015-12-31T03:21:43Z
-----------------------------------------------------------%
str1 = "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog."

str2 = """
The quick brown \


  fox jumps over \
    the lazy dog."""

key3 = """\
       The quick brown \
       fox jumps over \
       the lazy dog.\
       """
-----------------------------%
str1: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
str2: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
key3: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
-----------------------------------------------------------%
points = [ { "x" = 1, y = '2', z = 3 },   [
           { "x" = 7, y = '8', z = 9 },
           { "x" = 2, y = '4', z = 8 }, ] ]
-----------------------------%
points: [ { x: 1, y: "2", z: 3 }
        , [ { x: 7, y: "8", z: 9 }
          , { x: 2, y: "4", z: 8 }
          ]
        ]
-----------------------------------------------------------%
[[fruit]]
  name = "apple"

  [fruit.physical]
    color = "red"
    shape = "round"

  [[fruit.variety]]
    name = "red delicious"

  [[fruit.variety]]
    name = "granny smith"

[[fruit]]
  name = "banana"

  [[fruit.variety]]
    name = "plantain"
-----------------------------%
fruit:
  - name: apple
    physical:
      color: red
      shape: round
    variety:
      - name: red delicious
      - name: granny smith
  - name: banana
    variety:
      - name: plantain
-----------------------------------------------------------%
[x]
y=1
k={y = 2, k = 3}
-----------------------------%
x:
  y: 1
  k:
    y: 2
    k: 3
-----------------------------------------------------------%
[[a.fruit]]
  [[a.fruit.shop]]
[[b.fruit.shop]]
  [[a.fruit.shop.open]]
  a=4
  [[a.fruit.shop.open]]
  a = 4
    [a.fruit.shop.open.allday]
-----------------------------%
a:
  fruit:
    - shop:
        - open:
            - a: 4
            - a: 4
              allday: {}
b:
  fruit:
    shop: [ {} ]
-----------------------------------------------------------%
[k. f]
 f =false
[[e]]
[[e]]
f={}
[k.f.g]
-----------------------------%
e:
  - {}
  - f: {}
k:
  f:
    f: false
    g: {}
-----------------------------------------------------------%
